resources.string:
"HOMECOMING 2017

" "The Old Students' Association of Toc H (OSAT) is set to host its second reunion of, its memebers, a group of people who once called Toc H - Home!

" "The alumni are the true ambassadors of an Institution." Toc H Public School, Kochi has a very strong alumni base and has carved a niche for themselves in the world at large." "
Our old students working within our country as well as abroad have excelled in a wide variety of tasks and have brought laurels and glory to the alma mater." "
Our past students are working as Entrepreneurs, Politicians, Artists, Writers, Fashion designers, Managers, Business men etc. collectively have a wealth of knowledge and experience. OSAT brings all these outstanding ToPSanians, more than 3000 past students since 1984, together on a single platform.
"
